stack.description:
This stack contains packages for the Calvin robot. Specifically:
configuration files for the MoveIt!: kinematics, motion planning, trajectory filtering, collision map (package calvin_moveit_config)
a pick + place app using MoveIt! (package calvin_pick_n_place)
launch files to bring up the physical Calvin (package calvin_bringup)
launch files to bring up the Calvin in Gazebo (package calvin_gazebo)
URDF description of Calvin (package calvin_description)
a node to publish the joint states of the passive, adjustable joints (package calvin_joint_commander)
